name: Endless Runner AJ
description:
Endless Runner AJ:-

Hey dear, Welcome to the Endless Runner AJ.

I hope you enjoy to playing this game. This is a Indie game develop by BLS ( Bheru Lal Sahu  ). All work (Game Art, Game Design, Game Programming etc.) done by BLS.

BLS is a Indie Game Developer which is currently studying a game dev stuff. My game Dev Journey was started from 2020.

My Vision is not to change the World,

My Vision is to create a new Visual World in form of Games.

How to Play Endless Runner AJ Game:-

Playing Endless Runner AJ is very simple you can control player by using your finger touch.

For Moving Left  :-  Swipe Left by your finger

For Moving Right  :-  Swipe Right by your finger

For Jumping  :-  Swipe Up by your finger

What is Interesting thing in Endless Runner AJ:-

talking about interesting thing in Endless Runner AJ game is , its Endless game which means this game have no end point. In this game player can collect coins and Hearts. Using heart player will respawn and Continue your game without restarting it. In this game have obstacles to Avoided by Player if Player can collide with obstacle than player will die.

Security Perspective  :-

Security is the main concern at the time and our game is not needed any Kind of permission from your device. Also we do not have any malicious code in the game so fill free to use.

Who Can Play Endless Runner AJ  :-

Endless Runner AJ is made for all age group. So you can play it.

Advertisement  :-

Endless Runner AJ is not containing In-app Purchases and Advertisement. So without ads enjoy the game, its totally free to play.

2021-Endless Runner AJ | All rights reserved by BLS.

Thanks for playing!

I hope you enjoy the game!
